title: Can I shoot a low light portrait mode for Bokeh
content:
Hey I have request plz new features add like portrait shots on night with blurred light spots in the background while enhancing color on the face example I showed a Dslr probably  but a smartphone looks interesting and features camera option is very nice plz but it's not perfect photo but light spots look cool in the background this feature really cool and bokeh pop up are best plz try to understand this feature for Google pixel is best feature and marketing to create a (Dslr portrait real light Bokeh) .ook. 
And also keep in mind to create a smartphone feature also and special camera features  I also like portrait..üòçüëç
